001package squidpony.squidmath;
002
003/**
004 * This interface defines the interactions required of a random number
005 * generator. It is a replacement for Java's built-in Random because for
006 * improved performance.
007 *
008 * @author Eben Howard - http://squidpony.com - howard@squidpony.com
009 */
010public interface RandomnessSource {
011
012    /**
013     * Using this method, any algorithm that might use the built-in Java Random
014     * can interface with this randomness source.
015     *
016     * @param bits the number of bits to be returned
017     * @return the integer containing the appropriate number of bits
018     */
019    public int next(int bits);
020
021}
